markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Channel Smite](/Feats.aspx?ID=276) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 122 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Cost**
Expend a   harm   or   heal   spell.

**Prerequisites**
[harmful font or healing font](/Classes.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

You siphon the destructive energies of positive or negative energy through a melee attack and into your foe. Make a melee Strike and add the spell’s damage to the Strike’s damage. This is negative damage if you expended a [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) spell or positive damage if you expended a [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) spell. The spell is expended with no effect if your Strike fails or hits a creature that isn’t damaged by that energy type (such as if you hit a non-undead creature with a _heal_ spell).
